alert.note: Alert for Uvalde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:49PM CDT until April 20 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR UVALDE COUNTY... At 449 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blewett, or 9 miles west of Uvalde, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Uvalde, Knippa, Uvalde Estates, Blewett and Cline. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
